title: Champion Update: Ryze, the Rune Mage

replies.body: {{champion:83}} Enjoy this while you can Ryze. I am just around the corner.
{{champion:6}} I'm next
{{champion:19}} Actually I am up next after Yorick. See: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884

Also check for this update coming soon:
**https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Iu8m1GvFY8**

Lucky to have that :) I mean how long did we wait for this
So Ryze can have 3 reworks in a year, But {{champion:104}} cant have a Cigar?
He vapes now, Riot confirmed it.

Literally straight-up lore

EDIT: I'm sorely disappointed that no one has made "Vapelord Graves" fan art yet
Since it's confirmed that Graves vapes now, MLG Douchebag/Scumbag Graves Skin when?
Why are you so awesome cactopus?

Is it safe to assume his favorite vape juice is tobacco flavored?

Or does he prefer the "all natural" Churro flavor?
That's asking for too much.
{{champion:104}} doesn't need a cigar, he vapes now. (A rioter made a comment saying that Graves vapes from his gun and this is cannon now.)
I don't believe the rioter (cactopus) said anything about vaping *from his gun*.
You're not my real dad Riot, I should be able to ult on top of myself if I want I'm a big boy now.
Get the hell back in your room TheVideoGamer22. Wait til your mother comes home and hears about this.
Be nice to your wife's son.
He's right, I'm not his real dad

C'mon man, it's okay.
Understand they are called step-dads because they "step" up to the plate.
Cause they take over where the real dad stepped out.
Kids these days need father figures like yourself.  You put the DAD in step-dad.
"whenever Ryze is doing stuff: his arms flail around and a lot of blue shit comes out." So that's what that was, I always thought it was mana.
Let him say "Let's go, let's go!" when he uses ult pl0x.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

When you use {{champion:13}}'s new R to teleport your team over the wall and steal baron:

"Surpryze mother---"
I can't wait for the next Ryze Rework.  I hope this one was worth the delay on getting Yorick's done.
but they have 2 major rework teams and not only one so they were working on this and yorick at the same time

>> 2 major rework teams

Yeah, there's the team that just pumps out Ryze reworks, and the team that reworks everybody else

Riot's REAL confirmed rework schedule:

-Ryze
-Warwick
-Ryze
-Yorick
-Ryze
-Urgot
-Ryze
-Ryze again
{{champion:268}} RISE AGAIN!
{{champion:223}} : b-but **MY** ult...
You can opt-in to a Tahm ult, this is more akin to the troll Bard ult, or even the troll Kench "save."
Yay, bot lane is going to be even more fun!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
whats more fun than a double TP meta? A Team TP META!!!{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} Why riot -.-

People are saying that Ryze's new ult means the end of Kench, but I disagree. TAHM RYZE WOMBO COMBO INC! Tahm ults in w/ Ryze, Ryze prisons, Tahm eats whoever, then Ryze ults them out. INSTANT ABDUCTION! BEWARE AND REMEMBER TO PROTECT YOUR CARRIES!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Rito: "Whether it's a total noob trying Ryze for the first time or the best players in the world taking him to his mechanical limits, it always looks the same whenever Ryze is doing stuff: his arms flail around and a lot of blue shit comes out."

Me: That was the best part.
So... make a team of TF mid, Ryze top, reksai jungle, bard support and pretty much any adc and you have one of the hardest teams to catch out of position
Or, you could not bench the kench...
Quinn, Just quinn.(as the ad that is)
First we had TF ult for 1 person.  Then we had Tham Kench for two.  Now we have the Ryze ult for the whole darn team.
{{champion:13}} Ult is much shorter range though.
You havent forgotten about{{champion:3}} have you?{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Galio is perfect just the way he is, dont bring attention to him or else riot is gonna fuck him up. but he does need a new splash art cuz god damn, that shit aint pretty to look at.
This new update makes him look so much more fun
why do they not rework teemo
Because {{champion:17}} is actually pretty balanced. With his win rate, he is average. He is definitely really annoying to play against, but he is balanced.
The final nail in the Tahm Kench coffin
For a millennium, the archmage Ryze scoured the world, seeking out a rework that would drop him from competitive perma-ban status...
Alas poor Yorick, I knew him Horatio!

Yo Riot, you guys got a typo in paragraph three of "Re-Re Rework"

" had three major problems: **he's is** too difficult to learn"
Thanks friend! We fixed it.
_**"his arms flail around and a lot of blue shit comes out."**_ Nice one Riot. Nice one.

AS someone who was commenting against huge changes to Ryze and against reworks in general on one of the main boards about this. Gotta say you were right. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} The changes to the ult and visual animations seem like they are going to make Ryze even more fun. Also I am REALLY happy about the new splash arts and models as the newly proud owner of Zombie Ryze(which I can finally use). However Uncle Ryze's scroll(Declaration of Independence) is a little hard to see as such.
